system.description:
Man-portable rocket launcher utilizing unguided munitions. Rocket launchers are unsafe to use in enclosed spaces. Rocket payloads are considered high explosive and are not particularly effective against armored vehicles, against which they only deal 3D damage. At TL7, vehicle armor-piercing rockets cost Cr200 per rocket: trade Blast 6 for Blast 2, with a 5D damage against armored vehicles. Also at TL7 and with similar stats, an anti-aircraft homing missile costs Cr10,000 and does not suffer a penalty when firing at fast-moving air vehicles.

Blast 6: This weapon has an explosive component or is otherwise effective against targets in its blast radius. The number given is the blast radius in meters. 

Bulky: A weapon that has powerful recoil or is simply extremely heavyâ€”this makes it difficult to use effectively in combat by someone of a weak physical stature. Characters with STR 8 or less get a -2 penalty when using such weapons.
system.shortdescr: Man-portable rocket launcher utilizing unguided munitions
